name: Strenae the Rikka Queen
text:
2 Level 4 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Plant monster or 1 "Rikka" card in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card with material is Tributed: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 5 or higher Plant Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck or GY, then you can attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Strenae the Rikka Queen" once per turn.
